text:
Candidates who had appeared for the Diploma in Elementary Education Examination in May 2015 can apply for obtaining copies of their answer sheets and re-totalling of marks till February 20, according to a press release. Candidates can download the applications from the websitewww.tndge.inThey would have to pay prescribed fee at the respective District Institute of Education and Training, the release said. The candidates would have to pay Rs.275 per subject for obtaining copies of their answer sheets and online fee of Rs.50. Those who are applying for re-totalling of marks have to pay Rs.205 per subject.

Only online applications

Private candidates who wish to appear for the standard VIII public examinations to be held in April 2016 can apply online through the nodal centres from February 18 to 29, V.Murugan, Regional Deputy Director of Government Examinations, Tiruchi, said in a press release. Candidates can file their applications online through the designated nodal centres, notified in the website: www.tndge.in Candidates would have to apply only online and application sent through post would be rejected. They would have to pay an examination fee of Rs.125 besides the application registration fee of Rs.50 at the nodal centres.

TIDITISSIA hails interim budget

The Tiruchi District Tiny and Small Scale Industries Association has welcomed the state government’s decision to allot Rs.150 crore for skill development training in its interim Budget for 2016-17. In a statement issued here, N.Kanagasabapathy, president, TIDITISSIA, also welcomed the move to promote a heavy engineering component hub at Ponneri in Tiruvallur district.
title: Apply for answer sheets before Feb. 20
